svg.title: KSBCSP Visual Identity System v1.0
svg.desc: One-page brand guide. Sections: Logo Suite, Color System, Typography, Clear Space, Do/Don't, Applications.

g.inkscape:label: 03 · Logo Suite
g.text: Primary · Icon Only · Mono Dark · Mono Light

g.inkscape:label: Logo A — Primary Full Colour (Light BG)
g.text: Default. Use on white or light backgrounds for all digital + print.

g.inkscape:label: Logo C — Mono Dark (White on Navy)
Logo D — Mono Light (Ink on White)

text.tspan: The diagonal slash through the A mirrors the bolt angle — a signature detail. Always use the approved SVG master. Never recreate from type alone.

g.inkscape:label: Swatch — Warm Paper (Light BG)
g.text: Light-mode BG · Brand docs · Light UI

text.tspan: Large headers, brand doc titles, editorial pull
quotes. Adds warmth. Track −1 to −2 px at size.
All UI, body copy, wordmark, poster headlines.
Hex codes, section numbers, skill tags,
UI labels. Always uppercase + track 2–5 px.

g.inkscape:label: Clear space exclusion zone diagram
g.text: Clear Space Rule — unit x = badge height
MIN. CLEAR SPACE = 1× ON ALL SIDES

g.inkscape:label: Do — Full colour on approved BG
g.text: Use full colour logo on white/light backgrounds.

g.inkscape:label: Do — Icon only at small sizes
Do — Mono white on dark BG
Don't — Stretch or distort
g.text: Never stretch, skew, or distort the logo.

g.inkscape:label: Don't — Place on busy/patterned BG
g.text: Never place logo on busy/patterned BGs.

g.inkscape:label: 08 · Application Examples
g.text: Social Header · Event Flyer · Die-Cut Sticker

g.inkscape:label: App A — Social Post Header 1080×360
g.text: Left cyan bar · Logo + event copy · Consistent branded footer strip.

g.inkscape:label: App B — Event Flyer A5 Portrait
g.text: Bold title hierarchy · Cyan CTA · Amber accent · Branded footer.

g.inkscape:label: App C — Hexagonal Die-Cut Sticker 60mm
g.text: Hex die-cut · 4 mm white bleed · Full icon + wordmark · Print at 60 mm.

g.inkscape:label: 09 · Footer
g.text: KSBCSP Visual Identity System · v1.0 · Spring 2025 · Internal use only

g.inkscape:label: 99 · Notes — HIDE BEFORE EXPORT
g.text: KSBCSP BRAND GUIDE v1.0 · 2800×1980 px · A2 LANDSCAPE · HIDE THIS LAYER BEFORE EXPORT
